name: The Ultimate Carnage: Car Crash
description:
Be quick and destroy everything in your way !

Jump in the traffic and create the biggest car accident to gain more and more XP to unlock cars and maps !

The Ultimate Carnage : Car Crash is one of our best sellers game on android and ios, more than 150K downloads!

Now its time to launch it to PC for free and forever!

Feel free to donate if you want to help us make The Ultimate Carnage better than ever!

Featuring for now :

  • 60 unique vehicles ( cars, trucks, buses, proto... )
  • 8 Maps
  • Train crash
  • Detailled crash from our homemade Crash Engine

Check out the sequel The Ultimate Carnage 2 : Crash Time 

on Android and IOS
